english: Movietown News presents
Spotlight on Adventure.
What you are now witnessing

chinese: 是尚未为文明世界目睹的景象
english: Is footage never before seen by civilized humanity.
A lost world in South America.

chinese: 科学未知的大量植物和动物
english: Lurking in the shadow of majestic Paradise Falls.

chinese: 隐藏在壮观的天堂瀑布掩护之下
english: It sports plants and animals undiscovered by science.

chinese: 谁敢踏足这样荒凉的顶峰呢
english: Who would dare set foot on this inhospitable summit?
Why, oursubject today,

chinese: 查尔斯·孟兹  就没什么不敢
english: Charles Muntz!

chinese: 这位深受爱戴的探险家
english: The beloved explorer lands his dirigible. The Sp rt of Adventure,

chinese: 驾驶着他的"冒险精神"号于本周抵达汉普郡
english: In New Hampshire this week,

chinese: 即将去失落世界远征一年
english: Completing a yearlong expedition to the lost world.

chinese: 这强大的飞行器由查尔斯·孟兹亲自设计
english: This lighter-than-air craff was designed by Muntz himself

chinese: 它比22辆小马车首尾相接还要长
english: And is longer than 22 prohibltion paddy wagons placed end to end.
And here comes the adventurer now.

chinese: 孟兹和忠诚的狗伴们从不分离
english: Never apart from his faithful dogs,

chinese: 他设计的飞行器充分考虑到狗的舒适
english: Muntz conceived the craft forcanine comfort.

chinese: 这真是充满讽刺的空中宫殿
english: It's a veritable floating palace in the sky,

chinese: 装备了狗狗洗澡机和跑步机
english: Complete with doggy bath and mechanical canlne walker.
And, jiminy Cricket,
Do the locals consider Muntz the bee's knees.
And how! Adventure is out there!

chinese: 但是这次孟兹给我们带回了什么呢
english: But what has Muntz brought back this time?

chinese: 先生们  请看天堂瀑布怪兽
english: Gentlemen, l give you the monsterof Paradise Falls!
And, golly, what a swell monster this is:'

chinese: 但这到底是什么呢  科学家们大喊骗子
english: But what's thiS? Scientists cry foul.

chinese: 国家探险协会指控孟兹
english: The National Explorer'S Society accuses Muntz
Of fabricatlng the skeleton.
No!

chinese: 协会开除了孟兹的会员资格
english: The organization strips Muntz of his membership.

chinese: 倍感耻辱的孟兹发誓要重返天堂瀑布
english: Humiliated, Muntz vows a return to Paradise Falls
And promises to capture the beast alive!
I promise to capture the beast alive,
And l will not come back until l do!

chinese: 于是  这位探险家为洗刷罪名出征
english: And so. The explorer's off to clear his name.

chinese: 一路顺风  查尔斯·孟兹
english: Bon voyage, Charles Muntz,

chinese: 并希望你顺利捕获天堂瀑布怪兽
english: And good luck capturing the monsterof Paradise Falls!
Here's Charles Muntz
Piloting his famous dirigible.
He hurdles Pikes Peak.
He hurdles the Grand Canyon.
He hurdles Mount Everest.
He goes around Mount Everest.
Is there nothing he cannot do?

chinese: 是的  正如孟兹他自己说的那样  探险
english: Yes, as Muntz himSelf says, "Adventure is..."
Adventure s out there! Look out!
Mount Rushmore! Hard to starboard!

chinese: 驾驶"冒险精神"号飞过拉石茂山
english: Must get Spirit of Adventure over Mount Rushmore!

chinese: 团结起来  我的狗怎么了
english: Hold together, old girl. How're my dogs doing?
A engines ahead full!
Let's take her up to 26,000 feet.
Rudders 18 degrees towards the south.
It's a beautiful day
Winds out of the east at 10 knots.
Visibility unlimited.

chinese: 把天气记录到航海日志
english: Enter the weather in the logbook.

chinese: 下面有些东西  我要带回去研究
english: There's something down there. I will bring it back for science.
It's a puppy!

chinese: 来不及了  有暴风雨  闪电冰雹
english: No time! A storm! Lightning hail.
What are you doing?

chinese: 你不知道这是专属俱乐部吗
english: Don't you know this is an exclusive club?
Only explorers get in here,
Not just any kid

chinese: 带着头盔和护目镜的街头小孩是不行的
english: Off the street with a helmet and a pair of goggles.

chinese: 你觉得你有什么优势吗  有吗
english: Do you th nk you've got what it takes? Well, do you?

chinese: 好吧  算你一个  欢迎上船
english: All right, you're in. Welcome aboard.

chinese: 你怎么了  你是哑巴吗
english: What's wrong? Can't you talk?
Hey, I don't bite.

chinese: 你和我  我们现在在一个俱乐部了
english: You and me, we're in a club now.

chinese: 我看到你的气球去哪儿了
english: I saw where your balloon went.

chinese: 来吧  我们去把它取下来
english: Come on! Let's go get it.
My name's Ellie.
There it is.
Well, go ahead.
Go on.
Hey, kid!
Thought you might need a little cheering up.
I got something to show you.
I am about to let you see something

chinese: 我从来没给任何人看过的
english: I have never shown to another human being.
Ever! In my life!
You'll have to swear you will not tell anyone.
Cross your heart. Do it!
My Adventure Book.

chinese: 你知道他吧[C·孟兹  年度风云人物]
english: You know him.

chinese: 查尔斯·孟兹  探险家
english: Charles Muntz, explorer.

chinese: 等我长大了  我要去他去过的地方
english: When I get big, I'm going where he's going,

chinese: 南美洲  和美洲很像  但在南边
english: South Amerca. It's Iike America but south.
Wanna know where I'm gonna live?

chinese: 天堂瀑布  时间迷失之地
english: "Paradise Falls, a and lost in time."

chinese: 我从图书馆里的书上撕下来的
english: I ripped this right out of a library book.

chinese: 我要把俱乐部搬到那里去
english: I'm gonna move my clubhouse there
And park it right next to the falls.

chinese: 谁知道那里住了些什么
english: Who knows what lives up there.
And once I get there...

chinese: 我要把我所探险的地方
english: Well, I'm saving these pages
For all the adventures I'm gonna have.

chinese: 只是  我还不知道怎么到达天堂瀑布
english: Only I just don't know how I'm gonna get to Paradise Falls.

chinese: 对了  你可以用氢气球带我们过去
english: That's it! You can take us there in a blimp!

chinese: 发誓你会带我们去那里  快发誓
english: Swear you'll take us. Cross your heart!

chinese: 很好  你答应了  不许反悔
english: Cross it! Cross your heart! Good you promised. No backing out.

chinese: 好了  明天见  小子  再见
english: Well, see you tomorrow, kid. Bye!
Adventure is out there!
You know, you don't talk very much.
I like you.
Stevie, throw me a deuce!

chinese: 很壮观  是吧  艾莉
english: Quite a sight, huh, Ellie?
Mail is here.

chinese: 阴凉橡树林  退休村  真是的
english: Shady oaks, retirement village. Oh, brother!

chinese: 早上好  弗雷德里克森先生
english: Hey, good morning, Mr. Fredricksen.
Need any help there?
No. Yes!
Tell your boss over there

chinese: 你们这些人正在破坏我们的房子
english: That you boys are ruining our house.
Well, just to let you know,

chinese: 我老板会很高兴接手你的房子的
english: My boss will be happy to take this whole place off your hand.

chinese: 在上次出的价上再翻一倍
english: And would double his last offer.
What do you say to that?

chinese: 我想这应该是不同意了
english: I'll take that as a no, then.

chinese: 我想我已经对你老板明确表态了
english: I believe I made my position to your boss quite clear.
You poured prune juice in his gas tank.
Yeah, that was good!
Here, let me talk to him.

chinese: 穿西装的那个  对 就是你
english: You in the suit. Yes. You.
Take a bath. Hippie!
I am not with him!

chinese: 说真的  他会设法得到你的房子
english: This is serious! He's out to get your house!

chinese: 告诉你老板他可以拿走我的房子
english: Tell your boss he can have our house.
- Really?  - When I m dead!
I'll take that as a maybe.

chinese: 现在订购  你有了照相机
english: Order now. You get the camera,

chinese: 有了打印机 4倍光学变焦
english: You get the printer, 4x optical zoom,

chinese: 施耐德镜片  照片打印 SD卡
english: Schneider lens, photo printer, SD card.

And I am a wilderness explorer in tribe 54,
Squad lodge 12.

- Kid... Kid - And I am a Wilderness Explorer

english: - But I don't need any help! -" ...today, sir?"
Proceed.

chinese: 看到这些了吗  这些是野外探险徽章
english: See these? These are my Wilderness Explorer badges.

chinese: 你可能注意到这里少了一个
english: You may notice one is missing.

chinese: 这是帮助老年人的徽章
english: It's my Assisting the Elderly badge.

chinese: 如果我有了  我就能成为资深野外探险者了
english: If I get it, I'll become a Senior Wilderness Explorer.
The wilderness must be explored!

chinese: 那会很棒的  会有一个盛大的典礼
english: It's gonna be great! There's a big ceremony,

chinese: 所有的父亲都会来  为我们带上的徽章
english: And all the dads come and they pin on our badges.

chinese: 所以你想帮助一位老人对吗
english: So, you want to assist an old person?

chinese: 这样我就能成为资深野外探险者了
english: Yep! Then I'll be a Senior Wilderness Explorer.

chinese: -你有没有听说过沙锥鸟  -沙锥鸟
english: - You ever heard of a snipe? - Snipe?
A bird. Beady eyes.

chinese: 每天晚上  它都溜进我的花园
english: Every night it sneaks into my yardand
And gobbles my poor azaleas.
I'm elderly and infirm.
I can't catch it.
If only someone could help me.
Me, me, I'll do it!

chinese: 你行吗  它可是很狡猾的
english: I don't know, it's awfully crafty.

chinese: 你得拍手三次来引诱它
english: You'd have to cap your hands three times to lure it in.

chinese: 我会找到它  弗雷德里克森先生
english: I'll find himr, Mr. Fredricksen!

chinese: 我认为它的洞穴在两个街区外  若你穿过
english: I think its burrow is two blocks down. If you go past...

chinese: 两个街区外  知道了  沙锥鸟
english: Two blocks down. Got it. Snipe.

chinese: 过来这里  小锥锥  小锥锥
english: Here, snipey, snipey.
Bring it back here when you find it.
Snipe!
Okay, keep her coming. Keep coming.
And stop. Stop. Stop!

chinese: 什么  嘿  说你呢
english: Why.... Hey! Hey, you!

chinese: 你  你知道自己在干嘛吗
english: What do you.... What do you think you re doing?

chinese: -我很抱歉  先生  -别碰那个
english: - I am so sorry sir. -Don't touch that

english: No, no, no. Let me take care of that for you.

chinese: -离我的邮箱远一点  -先生  我
english: - Get away from our mailbox! - Hey Sir, I.
I don't want you to touch it!
Steve, you all right?
It looks bad.

chinese: 抱歉  弗雷德里克森先生
english: Sorry, Mr. Fredricksen.

chinese: 我认为你看起来不像会危害公共安全的人
english: You don't seem like a public menace to me.
Take this.

chinese: 橡树林的人明天早上会来接你
english: The guys from Shady Oaks will be by to pick you up in the morning, okay?

chinese: 我现在该怎么办  艾莉
english: What do I do now, Ellie?
Good morning, gentlemen.

chinese: 早上好  弗雷德里克森先生
english: Good morning, Mr. Fredricksen.
You're ready to go?
Ready as I'll ever be.

chinese: 能帮个忙替我拿着这个吗
english: Would you do me a favor and take this?
I'll meet you in the van in just a minute.

chinese: 我想和老房子最后说声再见
english: I wanna say one last goodbye to the old place.

chinese: 当然  多长时间都行  先生
english: Sure. Take all the time you need, sir.

chinese: 很常见  他很可能是第八十次去浴室流泪
english: That's typical. He's probably going to the bathroom for the 80th time.

chinese: 你肯定认为他应该把房子维护的更好
english: You think he'd take better care of His house
So long, boys!

chinese: 我会从天堂瀑布给你们寄明信片的
english: I'll send you a postcard from Paradise Falls!
We are on our way, Ellie.
Hi, Mr. Fredricksen.
It's me, Russell.

chinese: 你在外面做什么  孩子
english: What are you doing out here, kid?

chinese: 我找到沙锥鸟了  我跟着它来到你的门廊
english: I found the snipe and I followed it under your porch.

chinese: 但这个沙锥鸟有根长尾巴
english: But this snipe had a long tail
And looked more like a large mouse.
Please, let me in.
No.
Oh, alright, you can come....
I've never been in a floating house before.

chinese: 护目镜  看这些东西
english: Goggles... Look at this stuff!
Wow! You're going on a trip?

chinese: 天堂瀑布  时间迷失之地
english: "Paradise Falls, a land lost in time".

chinese: 别碰那个  你会弄脏的
english: Don't touch that! You'll soil it.

But you're smart,

chinese: 因为你可以带着电视  钟 还有行李
english: Because you have your tv, clocks and stuff.

Does it really work?

chinese: 孩子  你能不能停下
english: Kid would you stop with the....
- This makes it go right. - Let go of that...
- And that way's left. - Knock it off
Hey, look! Buildings.

chinese: 这幢楼离的好近  我快能碰到它了
english: That building's so close, I could almost touch it!
Wow, this is great!

chinese: 你也应该试试  弗雷德里克森先生
english: You should try this, Mr. Fredricksen.
Look, there's a bus

chinese: 就有一辆可以到我家的公交车
english: That could take me home two blocks away!

chinese: 我可以从这儿看到你的房子
english: Hey, I can see your house from here.
Don't jerk around so much, kid. Whoa!

chinese: 恩  那样好像行不通
english: Well, that's not gonna work.

chinese: 我知道那种云  是积雨云
english: I know that cloud, it's a cumulonimbus.

chinese: 你知道吗  当冷热空气对流
english: Did you know that a cumulonimbus forms
When warm air rises over cool air?

chinese: 我吹了一晚上气球  图什么呀
english: I stayed up all night blowing up ballons... For what?
...and that's how we get lightning.

chinese: -不错  小鬼  -弗雷德里克森先生
english: - That's nice kid - Mr. Fredricksen?
- What are you doing over there? - Look.
See? Cumulonimbus.
My pack!
Got ya!
I thought you were dead.
What happened?

chinese: 是我在驾驶  我做到了  我驾驶了房子
english: I steered us. I did it! I steered the house.
Steered us?

chinese: 你把自己的东西都绑住  然后小睡了一会
english: After you tied your stuff down, you took a nap.

chinese: 所以我就掌舵  把房子开到了这儿
english: So I went ahead and steered us down here.
Yeah, sure.
I can't tell where we are.
Oh, we're in South Amerca all right.

chinese: 这只是个小问题  我用野外探险GPS定位的
english: It was a cinch with my Wilderness Explorer GPS.
- GP What? - My dad gave it to Me.

chinese: 它能精确的显示我们在地球上的位置
english: It shows exacty where we are on the planet.

chinese: 有这个宝贝  我们永远都不会迷路
english: With this baby, we'll never be lost!

chinese: 我要把你放下去  找个公车站
english: Well get you down, find a bus stop,

chinese: 你只要告诉他们  你要找妈妈
english: You just tell the man you wanna go back to your mother.

chinese: 可以  但是我觉得天堂瀑布这儿没有公车
english: Sure, but I don't think they have buses in Paradise Falls.

chinese: 好了  我必须得这么做
english: There. That ought to do it.
Here, I'll give you some change for the bus fare.

chinese: 不用了  我用公交卡就行
english: No, I'll just use my city bus pass.
That's gonna be Iike a billion on transfers
To get back to my house.

chinese: 弗雷德里克森先生  还要多久啊
english: Mr. Fredricksen, how much longer?
Well, we're up pretty high.

chinese: 估计降落得花上好几个小时呢
english: Could take hours to get down.

chinese: 我觉得那是幢大楼什么的
english: That thing was.... Building or something.

chinese: 那是什么  弗雷德里克森先生
english: What was that, Mr. Fredricksen?
We can't be cose to the ground yet.
Wait! Wait, no don't! Don't don't!
Wait, wait. Wait!
Russell, hang on.
- Walk back. Walk back. - Okay.
Come on. Come on.
Where.... Where are we?

chinese: 看起来既不是城市又不是丛林
english: This doesn't look like the city or the jungle,
Mr. Fredricksen.

chinese: 别担心  艾莉  我抓住了
english: Don't worry, Ellie. I got it.
There it is!
Ellie, it's so beautiful!
We made it!

chinese: 我们成功了  罗索  我们可以飞过去
english: We made it! Russe, we could float right overthere!
Climb up, climb up!
You mean, assist you?

chinese: -是啊  随便了  -好  我爬上去
english: - Yeah, yeah, whatever. - Okay, I'll climb up!
- Watch it! - Sorry.

chinese: 你到了之后 先进去 然后把我拉上去
english: Now, when you get up there, go ahead and hoist me up.
Got it?
You on the porch yet?
What? That's it?
I came all this way here to get stuck

chinese: 难道就困在这个碎石桩的另一头
english: At the wrong end of this rock pile?
Great.
Hey, if I could assist you over there,

chinese: 你能帮我的徽章签名吗
english: Would you sign off on my badge?
What are you talking about?

chinese: 我们可以带你的房子走到瀑布那儿
english: We could walk your house to the fall.
- Walk it? - Yeah.

chinese: 毕竟我们已经降下来了
english: After all, we weigh it down,
We could walk it right overthere.

chinese: 就当是游行中的大气球
english: Like a parade balloon.

chinese: 我们要迅速且安静的走到瀑布

english: And if we are not at the falls when that happens
-Sand - We're not getting to the falls.
I found sand!
Don't you worry, Ellie.

english: We'll get our house over there.

chinese: 这已经很好玩了  不是吗
english: It is fun already, isn't it?
By the tme we get there,

chinese: 你会发现我帮了很大忙
english: You're gonna feel so assisted
Oh, Mr. Fredricksen,

chinese: 如果我们不小心分开了
english: If we happen to get separated,
Use the wilderness explorer call.

chinese: 对了  我们为什么要去天堂瀑布
english: Wait, why are we going to paradise falls, again?
Hey, let's play a game.

chinese: 游戏是  看谁沉默得最久
english: It's called "see who can be quiet the longest."

chinese: 酷  我妈妈也喜欢这个游戏
english: Cool! My mom loves that game!
Darn thing!

english: Come on, Russell. Would you hurry it up?
I'm tired. And my knee hurts.
Which knee?

chinese: 我胳膊肘疼  而且还想上厕所
english: My elbow hurts and I have to go to the bathroom.

chinese: 我五分钟前问过你去不去
english: I asked you about that five minutes ago.
Well, I didn't have to go then!
I don't wanna walk anymore.
Can we stop?

english: Russell, if you don't hurry up,
The tigers will eat you.

english: There are no tigers in South America. Zoology.
Oh, for the love of Pete!

english: Okay. Here! Hold my stuff.
I've always wanted to try this.
Mr. Fredricksen,

chinese: 我应该先挖洞还是后挖洞呢
english: Am I supposed to dig the ho e before or after?
None of my concern!
Oh. It's before!
Tracks?
Snipe.

chinese: 来啊  沙锥鸟  出来吧  沙锥鸟
english: Here, snipe. Come on out snipe.
Snipe!

chinese: 抓到你了  别害怕  小沙锥
english: Ha, Gotya. Don't be afraid, little snipe.
I am a Wilderness Explorer,

chinese: 我是所有野外生物的朋友
english: So I'm a friend to all of nature.
Want some more?

chinese: 嘿  小子  别吃完了  出来吧
english: Hi, boy. Don't eat it all. Come on out.

chinese: 过来  过来  别怕  小沙锥
english: Come on. Come on. Don't be afraid, little snipe.

chinese: 乖沙锥  沙锥小乖乖  乖乖
english: Nice snipe. Good little snipe. Nice....
Giant snipe.
- I found the snipe. - Oh, did you?

chinese: -它们长得高吗  -是的  非常高
english: - Are they tall? - Oh, yes. They're very tall.

chinese: 它们浑身五颜六色的吗
english: Do they have a Iot of colors?
They do indeed!
- Do they like chocolate? - Oh, yeah
Chocolate?
- Gah! What is that thing? - It's a snipe!

chinese: 根本没有沙锥鸟这种东西
english: There's no such thing as a snipe!
But you said snipes eat your...

chinese: 走啊  快离开这儿  走开
english: Go on! Get out of here! Go on!
Careful, Russell.

chinese: 看  弗莱德里克森先生  他喜欢我
english: Hey, look, Mr. Fredricksen. It likes Me.
- Russell! - No, stop! That tickles!

chinese: 滚开  快走开  走开
english: Get out of here. Go on! Get!

chinese: 别别别  凯文  没事的
english: Uh-oh. No, no no! Kevin! It's okay.

chinese: 弗雷德里克森先生是好人
english: Mr. Fredrcksen is nice.

chinese: -凯文  -对啊  我刚给他起的名字
english: - Kevin? - Yeah That's his name I just gave him.
Beat it! Vamoose! Scram!
Hey! Thats mine!
Shoo! Shoo Get out of here!
Go on! Beat it!

chinese: 我们可以带着他吗  拜托了
english: Can we keep him? Please?

chinese: 我会喂他吃东西  带他遛弯
english: I'll get the food for him. I'll walk him.
I'll change his newspapers
No.

chinese: 探险家是所有东西的好朋友
english: An explorer is a friend to all,

chinese: 不论是植物  鱼 甚至小鼹鼠
english: Be it a plant, a fish or a tiny mole.

chinese: -这根本就不押韵  -不  押韵
english: - That doesn't even rhyme. - Yeah it does.
- Hey, look, Kevin. - What?

chinese: 从那儿下来  谁让你上去了
english: Hey, get down! You're not allowed up there!
You come down here right now!
Sheesh!

chinese: 简直难以置信  艾莉
english: Can you believe this, Ellie?
Ellie?

chinese: 艾莉  我能带着这只鸟吗
english: Hey, Ellie! Could I keep the bird?
She said for you to let me.

chinese: 但我跟他说了不行  我告诉你不行
english: But I told him no. I told you no.
N-O.
I see you back there.

chinese: 走吧  离开这儿  嘘 骚扰其他人去吧
english: Go on! Get out of here. Shoo! Go annoy someone else for a while.
Hey, are you okay over there?
Hello?

chinese: 你好  先生  谢天谢地
english: Hello, sir! Thank goodness.

chinese: 知道这儿还有别人可真好
english: It's nice to know someone else is up here.
I can smell you.

chinese: 什么  你能闻到我们
english: What? You can smell us?
I can smell you.
- Hey! - You were talking to a rock.
Hey, that one looks like a turtle.

chinese: 看那边  那块看起来像只狗
english: Look at that one! That one looks like a dog!
- It is a dog. - What?
We're not allowed to have dogs in my apartment.
Hey, I like dogs!
We have your dog!
Wonder who he belongs to.
Sit, boy.

chinese: 看  他受过训练  握手
english: Hey, look, he's trained. Shake.
- Speak. - Hi, there.

chinese: 那只狗刚刚是不是说了"你好"
english: Did that dog just say "Hi, there"?
Oh yes.

chinese: 我叫逗逗  我刚遇见你  我很喜欢你
english: My name is Dug. I have just met you, and I love you.

chinese: 我的主人给我做了这个项圈
english: My master made me this collar.

chinese: 他是个聪明的好主人  给我做了这个项圈
english: He is a good and smart master and he made me this collar

chinese: 于是我就能说话了  松鼠
english: So that I may talk. Squirre!

chinese: 我的主人是个聪明的好主人
english: My master is good and sma.
It's not possible.

chinese: 是真的  我的主人很聪明
english: Oh, it is, because my master is small.

chinese: 酷  这些按钮是干什么的  小家伙
english: Cool. What do these do, boy?
Hey, would you
I use that coIIar...

chinese: 来交谈  您能不能停下来
english: To talk with. I would be happy if you stopped.
Russell, don't touch that.
It could be radioactve or something!
I am a great tracker.

chinese: 主人派我来执行一项特殊任务  就我一个
english: My pack sent me on a specia mission all by myself.
Have you seen a bird?

chinese: 我在找一只鸟  而且我已经闻到它的味道了
english: I want to find one, and I've been on the scent.

chinese: 我是个优秀的追踪者  我刚刚说过吧
english: I am a great tracker. Did I mention that?
Hey, that is the bird.

chinese: 我从没这么近距离的看过
english: I have never seen one up close,

chinese: 不过这就是我要找的鸟
english: But this is the bird.

chinese: 我能把您的鸟带到营地当俘虏吗
english: May I take your bird up to camp as my prisoner?

chinese: 可以  可以  带它走吧
english: Yes, yes, take it.

chinese: 而且  路上你还可以学学怎么像真狗一样叫
english: And on the way, learn how to bark like a real dog.
I can bark.
And here's howling.

chinese: 我能留着他吗  行吗  拜托
english: Can we keep him? Please, please, please.

chinese: -不行  -但这是一只会说话的狗
english: - No. - But it's a talking dog!

chinese: 这不过是个古怪的把戏什么的
english: It's just a weird trick or something.
Let's get to the fall.
Please be my prisoner!
Oh please, oh, please be my prisoner!

chinese: 就是这儿  我闻到那只鸟的味道了
english: Oh! Here it is. I picked up the bird's scent!

chinese: 等等  等等  什么味道
english: Wait a minute, wait a minute! What is this?

chinese: 巧克力  我闻到巧克力味了
english: Chocolate. I smell chocolate.

chinese: 我闻到了梅子干和姜汁奶油  他们是谁
english: I'm getting prunes and ginger cream. Who are they?

chinese: 惨了  主人不会高兴的
english: Oh, man, the master will not be pleased.

chinese: 我们最好告诉他  有人捉到了那只鸟
english: We'd better tell him someone took the bird,
Right, Alfa?
No.

chinese: 很快那只鸟就又会是我们的了
english: Soon enough the bird will be ours yet again.

chinese: 跟着气味走  朋友们
english: Find the scent, my compadres,

chinese: 当然  对于你们付出的努力
english: And you too shall have much rewardings

chinese: 主人也会好好奖赏你们的
english: From Master for the toil factor you wage.

chinese: 阿尔法  我觉得你的项圈好像有问题
english: Alpha, I think there's something wrong with your collar.
You must have broken it.

chinese: 是啊  你声音怪怪的
english: Yeah. Your voice sounds funny.

chinese: 贝塔  伽马  也许你们想要  松鼠
english: Beta! Gamma! Mayhaps you desire to.... Squirrel
Mayhaps you deslre to challenge the ranking

chinese: 我凭借勇气和机智而被主人赐予的权利
english: That l have been assigned by my strength and cunning.

chinese: 没有  没有  但也许逗逗想
english: No, no, no But Maybe Dug would.
You might wanna ask him.

chinese: 对  不知道他是不是执行"非常任务"时候
english: Yeah. I wonder if he's found the bird
On his very specia mission
Do not mention Dug to me at this time.

chinese: 他的白痴差事会让他忙的团团转
english: His fool's errand will keep him most occupied!
Most occupied indeed.

chinese: 难道你们对我刚说的有异议吗
english: Do you not agree with that which I am saying to you now?

chinese: 当然没有  但如果主人再知道
english: Sure, but the second Master finds out
You sent Dug out by himself,
None of us will get a treat.

chinese: 你很聪明  亲爱的中尉
english: You are wise, my trusted lieutenant.

chinese: 我是阿尔法  呼叫逗逗  快接听
english: This is Alpha calling Dug. Come in. Dug.

chinese: 你好  阿尔法  你声音真好笑
english: Hi, Alpha. Hey, your voice sounds funny.

chinese: 我知道  我知道  你见着那鸟了吗
english: I know, I know! Have you seen the bird?

chinese: 见到了  它现在是我的俘虏
english: Why, yes. The bird is my prisoner now.
Yeah, rght!
Impossible. Where are you?
I am here with the bird

chinese: 我要把它带回去  然后你就会喜欢我的
english: And l will bring it back, and then you will like me.

chinese: -得挂了  -逗逗  你在和谁说话
english: - Gotta go. - Hey, Dug, who you talking to?
- No, wait, wait! - What's Dug doing?

chinese: 他怎么和个小邮差在一起
english: Why is he with the small mailman?
Where are they?
There he is. Come on.!

chinese: 求你了 求你了  做我的俘虏吧
english: Oh, please, oh, please, oh, please be my prisoner.

chinese: 逗逗  别再烦凯文了
english: Dug, stop bothering Kevin!

chinese: 那个人说我可以带走这鸟
english: That man there says I can take the bird,

chinese: 而且我把他当作主人来爱
english: And I love that man there like he is my master.
I am not your master!
I am warning you once again, bird.
- Hey! Quit it - I am jumping on you now bird.

chinese: 罗索  照这样下去咱们永远也到不了瀑布
english: Russell, at this rate we'll never get to the falls.
Here bird.

chinese: 我谁的主人也不是  知道吗
english: I am nobody's Master, got it?

chinese: 我不想再见到你 还有你
english: I don't want you here, and I don't want you here!
I'm stuck with you!

chinese: 如果你俩不在我数到三之前消失
english: And if you two don't clear out of here by the time I count to three...

chinese: 球球  天啊  天啊  球球
english: A ball! Oh, boy, oh, boy, a ball!
Ball? Yeah yeah? You want it, boy?
Yes, I do. I do ever so want the ball.
- Go get it! - Oh boy! Oh boy!
I will get it and then bring it back!

chinese: 罗素  快给我点巧克力
english: Quick, Russell, give me some chocolate.
- Why? - Just give to me!
Bird! Bird!
Come on, Russell.

chinese: 等一下  弗雷德里克森先生
english: Wait! Wait, Mr. Fredricksen!
What are we doing?

chinese: 咱们已经走好远了  凯文会找不到我的
english: Hey, we're pretty far now. Kevin's gonna miss me.
I think that did the trick.
Hi, master.
Afternoon.

chinese: 多亏你我们才不被淋湿  艾莉
english: Well, thanks for keeping us dry, anyway, Ellie.
Which one is the front?
Oh, boy.

chinese: 该第三步还是第五步了
english: Is this step three or step five?
There.
All done. That's for you.
Tents are hard.

chinese: 等等  你不是带着GPM和胸章
english: Wait. Aren't you super wilderness guy,

chinese: 的超级野外生存专家吗
english: With the GPMs and the badges?

chinese: 是啊  不过  我能告诉你一个秘密吗
english: Yeah, but can I tell you a secret?
- No. - All right. Here it goes.

chinese: 我从未搭过帐篷  好了  我说了
english: I never actually built a tent before. There! I said it.
You've been camping before, haven't you?
Well, never outside.

chinese: 那你为什么不问你爸爸怎么搭帐篷呢
english: Well, why didn't you ask your dad how to build a tent?

chinese: 我想他不想和我说这些
english: I don't think he wants to talk about this stuff.

chinese: 为什么不找机会问问他  也许他会教你
english: Why don't you try him sometime. Maybe he'll surprise you.

chinese: 他经常不在家  我总见不到他
english: Well, he's away a lot. I don't see him much.
He's gotta be home sometime.

chinese: 我打电话  但是菲丽丝说我总烦他
english: Well, I call, but Phyllis told me I bug him too much.

chinese: 菲丽丝  你直接叫你妈妈的名字吗
english: Phyllis? You call your own mother by her first name?
Phyllis isn't my mom.

chinese: 但他答应参加我的探险家典礼
english: But he promised he'd come to my Explorers Ceremony

chinese: 为我戴上"协助年长老人"胸章
english: To pin on my Assisting The Elderly Badge.

chinese: 到时候他就能教我搭帐篷了  是吧
english: So, he can show me about tents then, right?
Hey, why don t you get some sleep?
Don't wanna wake up the traveling flea circus.
Mr. Fredricksen,

chinese: 逗逗说他要把凯文抓起来
english: Dug says he wants to take Kevin prisoner.
We have to protect him.
Can Kevin go with us?
All right, he can come.
Promise you won't leave him?
- Yeah. - Cross your heart?
Cross my heart.

chinese: 艾莉  我都做了什么蠢事啊
english: What have I got myself into, Ellie?
Good morning, sweetheart.
We'd better get moving.
Bird's gone.

chinese: 也许罗索不会发现  好啦  都起床
english: Maybe Russell won't notice. All right, everybody up!

chinese: 凯文在哪儿  他跑丢了
english: Where's Kevin? He's wondered off!

chinese: 凯文  逗逗  把凯文找回来
english: Kevin! Dug, find Kevin!

chinese: 去找鸟  去找鸟  发现了
english: Find the bird, find the bird! Point!
Look! There he is.
Point!

chinese: 那是我的食物  给我从屋顶上下来
english: Hey, that's my food! Get off my roof!

chinese: 就是  从他的无顶上下来
english: Yeah, get off of his roof!
What is it doing?
The bird is calling to her babies.
Her babies!
Kevin is a girl?

chinese: 她的家就在那边的乱石上
english: Her house s over there in those twisty rocks.
She has been gathering food for her babies
And must get back to them.
Wait, Kevin is just leaving.

chinese: 但是你保证了要保护她
english: But you promised to protect her.

chinese: 她的宝宝需要她  咱们要护送她去团聚
english: Her babies need her. We gotta make sure they're together.

chinese: 抱歉  罗索  我们已经浪费够多时间了
english: Sorry, Russell. We've lost enough time already.
Yeah.

chinese: 这是她最喜欢的巧克力
english: This was her favorite chocolate.

chinese: 你把她赶走了  剩下的都给你吧
english: Because you sent her away, there's more for you.
Kevin?

chinese: 鸟呢  你说你抓住鸟了
english: Where's the bird? You said you had the bird!
Oh, yes, oh, yes.

chinese: 我是说过  我也明白你是怎么想的
english: Since I have said that, I can see how you would think that.
- Where is it? - Uh.... Tomorrow.

chinese: 明天再来  那时候我就能再抓到它了
english: Come back tomorrow, and then I will again have the bird. Yes.

chinese: 你跟丢了 我怎么一点都不奇怪呢
english: You lost it. Why do I not have a surprised feeling?

chinese: 至少你带我们找到了这个小邮差
english: Well, at least you now have led us to the small mailman
And the one who smells of prunes.

chinese: 我们找到他们  主人会很满意的
english: The master will be most pleased we have found them.

chinese: 他有很多问题要问  走吧
english: He will ask them many questions. Come.

chinese: 等等  我们不跟你们走
english: Wait! We're not going with you.
We're going to the falls!
Get away from me!
Get down!
Stay!
You came here in that?
Uh, yeah.

chinese: 一个房子  会飞的房子
english: In a house? A floating house?

chinese: 那是我见过最烂的东西了
english: That is the darnest thing I've ever seen!

chinese: 你们不是来追我的鸟的  是吧
english: You're not after my bird, are you?
But if you needed to borrow a cup of sugar
I'd be happy to oblige.
Well, this is all a misunderstanding.
My dogs made a mistake.

chinese: 等等  你是查尔斯·曼茨吗
english: Wait. Are you Charles Muntz?
Yeah, well, yes.
The Charles Muntz?
Adventure's out there!
It's really him! That's Chares Muntz!

chinese: -是谁  谁是查尔斯·曼茨  -他呀
english: - It is? Who's Charles Muntz? - Him!

chinese: -对  是他  -我是卡尔·弗雷德里克森
english: - Yes! Yes That’s him! - I'm Carl Fredricksen.

chinese: 我太太和我是您的忠实粉丝
english: My wife and I, we were your biggest fans.
Oh, well. You're a man of good taste.

chinese: 你们一定很累了  饿吗
english: Now, you must be tired. Hungry?
Uh-huh.
Now, attention, everyone!

chinese: 这两人不是入侵者  他们是客人
english: These people are no longer intruders. They are our guests.

chinese: 跟我来  我暂时喜欢你
english: Follow me. I Iike you temporarily.
You do smile like prunes.
I will not bite you.

chinese: 小邮差闻起来像巧克力
english: The small mailman smells like chocolate!
I'm sorry about the dogs,

chinese: -但愿他们没对你们很凶  -我们没有
english: - I hope they weren't too rough on you. - We weren't.

chinese: 来吧  把你的飞船系在我的旁边
english: Go ahead and moor your airship right next to mine.

chinese: 我们不是要上"冒险精神"号里面吧
english: We are not actually going inside the Spirit of Adventure itself?
Would you like to?
Would I?
Wait up, Mr. Muntz!
Jiminy Cricket!

chinese: -你不准进  -我们怎么处置逗逗
english: - Not you! - What do we do with Dug?

chinese: 他放跑了鸟  给他戴上"耻辱锥帽"
english: He lost the bird. Put him in the Cone of Shame.
I do not like the Cone of Shame.

chinese: 大多收藏品都存放在世界顶级博物馆里
english: Most of the collection is housed in the world's top museums.

chinese: 纽约  慕尼黑  伦敦
english: New York, Munich, London.

chinese: 当然  我把最好的留给自己
english: Of course I kept the best for myself.
Did you ever! WiII you Iook at that?
Oh, yes, the Arsinoitherium.

chinese: 在我刷牙的时候袭击我
english: Beast charged while I was brushing my teeth.
Used my shaving kit to bring it down.
Oh yeah. Well, surprise me.

chinese: 当初把它带出埃塞俄比亚的唯一法子
english: Only way to get it out of Ethiopia at the time

chinese: 就是声称它是个尖端武器
english: Was to have it declared as denta equipment.

chinese: 天啊  巨型索马里拉布拉多犬
english: Oh, my gosh! The giant Somalian Somalian Labradodis!

chinese: 你知道这个  真不错
english: Oh, you recognize it? I'm impressed!
There's an interesting story there.
Excellent choice.

chinese: 我和罗斯福一起游猎的时候碰到的
english: I found it on safari with Roosevelt.
He and I fell into a habit of

chinese: 一起玩金罗美[一种两人玩的纸牌游戏]
english: Playing Gin Rummy in the evenings,
And did he cheat!
Oh, he was horrible.

chinese: 主人  晚餐准备好了
english: Master, dinner is ready.

chinese: 亲爱的  翻译器坏了
english: Oh, dear, broken translator.

chinese: 线圈又松了吧  好啦  好家伙
english: I think it's that loose wire again. There you go, big fellow.
Thank you, Master.
I liked his other voice.
Well, dinner is served. Right this way.
So, how are things States side, huh?
Almost tempted to go back a few times.

chinese: 但是我尚未完成在这里的使命
english: But I have unfinished work here.

chinese: 来吧  但愿你们饿了
english: Please! I hope you're hungry.

chinese: 因为伊普西隆是我有过的最好的厨师
english: Because Epsilon is the finest chef I've ever had.

chinese: 伊普西隆  你又做了这个
english: Oh, Epsilon, you've done it again!
Yes!
Hey! Hey!

chinese: 我家艾莉一定会爱上这些的
english: Oh. My Ellie would have loved all these.

chinese: 因为你  她一直梦想着能到这里
english: You know its because of you she had this dream

chinese: 并且在天堂瀑布旁边住下来
english: To come down here and ve by Paradise Falls.

chinese: 我很荣幸  现在你做到了
english: I'm honored. And now you've made it.

chinese: 我们真的没有打扰到您吧  我不想招人烦
english: You sure we're not bothering you? I'd hate to impose.

chinese: 没有  能有客人是很开心的
english: No, no, it's a pleasure to have guests.
A real treat.

chinese: -奖赏  -我的奖赏呢  我要奖赏
english: - Treat? - Where's my treat? I want my treat!

chinese: 不是  安静  冷静下来
english: No, no. Quiet! Calm down, calm down.
- I want a treat! I want a treat! - Hey!
I shouldn't have used that word.
Having guests is a delight!

chinese: 通常只有小偷来偷我的合法财产
english: More often I get thieves come to steal what is rightfully mine.
No.

chinese: 他们说我是骗子  那些
english: They called me a fraud, those

chinese: 但只要我带回去这个家伙
english: But once I bring back this creature,
My name will be cleared.
Beautiful, isn't it?

chinese: 我花了大半辈子寻找它
english: Oh, I've spent a lifetime tracking it.

chinese: 岁月总是在寻觅中就消逝了
english: Sometimes years go by between sightings.

chinese: 我试过从它住的死亡之地里面找到它
english: I've tried to smoke it out of that death land where it lives.
You can't go in after it.
Once in, there's no way out.
I lost so many dogs.
And here they come, these bandits,
And think the bird is theirs to take.

chinese: 但他们很快就发现这山头
english: But they soon found that this mountain
Is a very dangerous place.
Hey, that looks like Kevin.

chinese: - 凯文  -是啊  我的巨鸟新宠物
english: - Kevin? - Yeah, that's my new giant pet bird!
I trained it to follow us.

chinese: 跟着你们  不可能  怎么训练
english: Follow you? It's impossible. How?
- She likes chocolate. - Chocolate?

chinese: 是啊  我喂她巧克力  她很喜欢
english: Yeah. I gave hersome of my chocolate. She goes gaga for it.

chinese: 但已经喂光了  它也跑了
english: But it ran off. It's gone now.

chinese: 你知道吗  卡尔  来过这里的人
english: You know Carl, these people who pass through here,
They all tell pretty good stories.
A surveyor making a map.

chinese: 有给植物编目的植物学家
english: A botanist cataloguing plants.

chinese: 还有把房子搬到天堂瀑布的老头
english: An old man taking his house to Paradise Falls.
I mean that's the best one yet.

chinese: 我都等不及知道最后的结局了
english: I cant wait to hear how it ends.

chinese: 今宵虽欢乐  但我们该走了
english: Well, it's been a wonderful evening, but we'd better be going.
Oh, you're not leaving.

chinese: 您的热情好客我心领了
english: We don't want to take advantage of your hospitality.
Come on, Russell.

chinese: 可是  甜品都还没吃呢
english: But we haven't even had dessert yet.

chinese: 这孩子说得对  甜品都还没吃呢
english: Oh, the boy is right. You haven't had dessert.

chinese: 耶普希隆做的樱桃蛋糕很美味
english: Epsilon here makes a delicious cherries jubilee.

chinese: 你们一定要留下  一定
english: Oh. You really must stay! I insist!

chinese: 我们还有很多话要说呢
english: We have so much more to talk about!
Kevin?
It's here.
Get them!
- Hurry! - I am hurrying!
Ahhh! They're coming!
Master! Over here!

chinese: 主人  朝有光的地方走
english: Go toward the light, Master!
Russell!
Get back!

chinese: 主人快跑  我来阻止他们
english: Go on, master! I will stop the dogs!
Stop, you dogs!
Help!
Help!
Help!
Give me your hand!
Hang on to Kevin!
Kevin.

chinese: 不行  凯文  躺着别动
english: No, no, no. Kevin. Stay down.

chinese: 她伤得很重  能把她送回家吗
english: She's hurt real bad. Can't we help her get home?
All right, but we gotta hurry.
You lost them?

chinese: 不是  逗逗妨碍我们了
english: No, it was Dug.

chinese: 没错  他们是一伙的  还帮他们逃跑
english: Yeah. He's with them. He helped them escape!
Wait.

chinese: 等一下  可以追踪逗逗
english: Wait a minute. Dug.
See anything?

chinese: 没有  我的同伴没追来  一群笨狗
english: No, my pack is not following us. Boy, they are dumb.
This is crazy.
I finally meet my chidlhood hero,

chinese: 居然追杀我们  真是笑话
english: And he's trying to kill us. What a joke!
Hey, I know a joke.
A squirrel walks up to a tree and says,

chinese: "我忘记准备过冬粮  所以现在要挂了"
english: "I forgot to store acorns for winter and now I am dead".
Ha! It s funny because the squirrel gets dead.
Careful, Russell.
You okay, Kevin?

chinese: 弗莱德里克森先生  你知道吗
english: You know what, Mr. Fredricksen?

chinese: 野外生活跟我的预想大相径庭
english: The wilderness isn't quite what I expected.
Yeah? How so?
It's kind of wild.
I mean, it's not how they made it sound in my book.
Get used to that, kid.
My dad made it sound so easy.
He is really good at camping,
And how to make fire from rocks and stuff

chinese: 凡是我的小组会议  他都会出席
english: He used to come to all my squad lodge meetings.

chinese: 开完会以后  我们会去吃雪糕
english: And afterwards, we go get icecream that fattens.

chinese: 我吃巧克力味  他吃脆心香草味
english: I always get chocolate and he gets butter brickle.

chinese: 然后我们一起坐在马路边
english: Then we sit on this one curb, right outside

chinese: 我数蓝色的车  他数红色的车
english: And I'll count all the blue cars and he counts all the red ones,
And whoever gets the most wins.
I like that curve.
It might sound boring,

chinese: 但这些事我记得最深刻
english: But I think the boring stuff is the stuff I remember the most.
Look, there it is!

chinese: 等等  罗索  别动
english: Hold on, Russell, stand still.

chinese: 瞧那鸟高兴的  慢点  你这只变异的鸡
english: Look at that bird go! Wait up, you overgrown chicken!

chinese: 就是那里 去吧 凯文
english: That's it! Go, Kevin!
Go find your babies!

chinese: 快跑  凯文  快逃
english: Run, Kevin, run!
Oh, no!

chinese: 罗索  把你的刀给我
english: Russell, give me your knife!
Get away from my bird!
No!
No!

chinese: 当心点  我要带个完好无损的回去
english: Careful, I want it in good shape for my return.
Let her go! Stop!
Kevin!

chinese: 你让他们把凯文抓走了
english: You gave away Kevin.
You just gave her away.
This is none of my concern.
I didn't ask for any of these!
Master, it's all right.
I am not your master!

chinese: 如果不是你  这些事根本不会发生
english: If you hadn't have shown up, none of these would have happened.
Bad dog! Bad dog!
Now, whether you assist me or not,

chinese: 即使拼了命  我都要去天堂瀑布
english: I am going to paradise falls, if it kills me!
Here. I don't want this anymore.
Russell?
Russell!

chinese: 我要去救凯文  就算你不干我也要去
english: I'm gonna help Kevin, even if you won't!
No, Russell, no!
Russell?
Dug!

chinese: 我躲在你的门廊下面  因为我敬爱你
english: I was hiding under your porch because I love you.
Can I stay?

chinese: 还用问吗  你是我的狗  对吧
english: Can you stay? Well, you're my dog, aren't you?
And I'm your master.
You're my master?
Oh boy! Oh boy!

chinese: 好孩子  逗逗  你是个好孩子
english: Good boy, Dug! You're a good boy!
Yes!

chinese: 别怕  凯文  我来救你
english: Don't worry, Kevin, I'll save...
And they wouldn't believe me.

chinese: 等到他们看到你肯定会大跌眼镜的
english: Just wait till they get a look at you!
Master.
- The small mailman has returned. - What?
Let me go!
Where is your elderly friend?
He's not my friend anymore.

chinese: 你来了  弗雷德里克森也不会跑远
english: Well, if you're here, Fredricksen can't be far behind.
Where are you keeping Kevin?
Let me go!

chinese: 你就尽管叫吧  小邮差
english: Scream all you want, small mailman.
None of your mailmen friends can hear you.

chinese: 我要把所有的荒野探险技巧都使出来
english: I will unleash all my wilderness explorer training!

chinese: 阿尔法  弗雷德里克森要来了
english: Alfa, Fredricksen is coming back!
Guard that bird.

chinese: 看到那个老头  你知道该怎么办吧
english: If you see the old man, you know what to do

chinese: 你要去哪  我还没说完呢
english: Hey, where are you going? I'm not finished with you!
Nice talking with you.

chinese: 弗雷德里克森  你在哪
english: Where are you, Fredricksen?
Help!
Russell!

chinese: -弗雷德里克森先生  -逗逗  收绳子
english: - Mr. Fredricksen! - Dug, bring that over!

chinese: 我们一起去救凯文  快去救她
english: You came back for Kevin! Let's go get her!

chinese: 我去救她  你留在这
english: I'm getting Kevin. You stay here.
But I wanna help.
I don't want your help.
I want you safe.
How do we get pass these dogs?
Point!
Kevin!

chinese: 别怕  凯文  我们来了
english: Don't worry, Kevin. We are on our way.
Allow no one should be enterring through these doors.

chinese: 守好这只鸟  听到没有
english: Guard well that bird, my minions.
What do we do now, Dug?
Who wants the ball?
- Me. I want it! - Me. I do!
- I want the ball! - Give it to me!
Then go get it!
I'm gonna get there first!
Getting the ball!
I got it!
Uh-oh.

chinese: 对不起  凯文  我这就放你出来
english: I'm sorry, Kevin. Let's get you out of here.

chinese: -主人  他跑啦  那个老头  -什么
english: - Master! He's gone! The old man! - What's going on?

chinese: -他在这里  -他找到鸟了  -逃跑了
english: - He's here! - He's got the bird! - The bird's gone...

chinese: 冷静点  一个一个说
english: Calm down! One at a time!
I want...to...help!
- He's in Hall D! - He's in Hall C!
It's the old man!
Does anyone know where they are?

chinese: 歼击队  打掉那房子
english: Gray Leader? Take down the house.
Gray Leader checking in.
Gray Two, checking in.
Gray Three, checking in.
Target sighted.
Come on, Kevin.
Hi.

chinese: 还有遗言吗  弗雷德里克森
english: Any Iast words, Fredricksen?
Come on! Spit it out!
- Come on. - Enough

chinese: 是死是活  我都要把那只鸟带回去
english: I am taking that bird back with me. Alive or dead.
Come on, Kevin.

chinese: 我要抓住你  好好折磨一番  逗逗
english: I will have many enjoyments from what I am about to do, Dug.
He wears the Cone of Shame!

chinese: 什么  别光傻坐着  攻击
english: What? Do not just continue sitting. Attack!

chinese: 停  停  都不许笑
english: No, no! Stop your laughing!
Get this off of me!

chinese: 狗儿  给我听着  坐下
english: Listen, you dog. Sit!
Yes, Alpha.

chinese: 阿尔法  我不是阿尔法  他才是
english: Alpha? I am not Alpha. He is....
Oh!
I can't do it.
Russell.

chinese: 不能丢下弗雷德里克森先生
english: You leave Mr. Fredricksen alone!
Hey! Squirrel!

chinese: 松鼠  在哪  在哪
english: SquirreI? Where? Where? Where?
Where's the squirrel?
I hate squirrels!
Dug!
Master!

chinese: 罗索  这边来  快走
english: Russell, over here! Let's go!
Mr. Fredricksen!
Go on, Kevin.
No!
Russell, get out of there!
No. Leave them alone!

chinese: 罗索  抱住凯文  抓紧了
english: Russell, hang on to kevin! Don't let go of her.
Kevin! Chocolate!
That was cool!

chinese: 孩子  别乱跑啊  当心罗索
english: Don't jerk around so much, kid. Easy Russell.

chinese: 我本来不准备上这么高的地方
english: Oh, I am ready to not be up high.

chinese: 弗雷德里克森先生  对不起  你的房子没了
english: Sorry about your house, Mr. Fredricksen.

chinese: 算了  只是一栋房子而已
english: You know, its just a house.
Look at you. You're so soft.
I wish I could keep one.

chinese: 我的拐杖呢  刚才还在的
english: Where is my cane? I just had it here.

chinese: 算了  你们留着吧  就当我送的小礼物
english: You know what? Keep them. A little gift from me to you.
Bye Kevin!
Ready?
Ready.
And by receiving their badges,

chinese: 这些获奖的探险者  将成为高级探险者
english: The following Explorers will graduate to Senior Explorers.

chinese: 这是极限攀登知识徽章  恭喜  吉米
english: For Extreme Mountaineering Lore. Congratulations. Jimmy.

chinese: 野生动物保护技术徽章  恭喜  布兰登
english: For Wild Animal Defensive Arts. Congratulations. Brandon.
For Assistlng the Elderly....
Uh, Russe , is there someone that....

chinese: 不好意思  老人家腿脚不灵活
english: Excuse me. Pardon me. Old man coming through.
I'm here for him.
Congratulations, Russell. Sir.

chinese: 罗索  协助年长者徽章
english: Russell, for Assisting the Elderly

chinese: 尽职尽责  表现优异
english: And for performing above and beyond the call of duty,

chinese: 现给你授予我所颁发的最高荣誉
english: I would like to award you the highest honor I can bestow.
The Ellie Badge.
All right. I think that covers everybody.
So let's give a big explorer call
To our brand new Senior Wilderness Explorers.
Ready, everybody?
- Blue one. - Red one
- Blue one. - Gray one.
- Red one. - That's a bike.
It's red, isn't it?

chinese: 弗雷德里克森先生  你耍赖
english: Mr. Fredricksen, you're cheating.
No, I'm not. Red one.
That's a fire hydrant.
Maybe I need new lessons.
Another blue one.
